name: Chronicles of Egypt
description:
"Study the past if you would define the future." -  Confucius

Chronicles of Egypt is an educational video game. Start at the unification of the Upper and Lower Kingdoms, traveling along the timeline as you play in four distinct game modes. First the Agriculture mode sets the player up in  some clear land, ripe for planting and harvesting, you must accumulate enough to progress within a turn limit. Second the Culture mode pits you in a race against time as you must collect the necessary resources to construct a home for the late Pharaoh's body. Third the Defense mode, build a variety of towers to protect your lands as you engage with enemies from within and from abroad. Last is the knowledge test where you prove your intelligence about the history of the Old Kingdom.
